game.title: Mineclonia

long_description:
# Obsidian Extra

This is a loose port of mod [ObsidianExt](https://github.com/esvarc/ObsidianExt) [for Minecraft](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/obsidian-extra) whose few graphical assets are used here under the MIT License.

This mod adds to the [Mineclonia](https://content.luanti.org/packages/ryvnf/mineclonia/) experience the following items.

* Obsidian Door
* Obsidian Trapdoor*
* Obsidian Button
* Obsidian Fence*
* Obsidian Fence gate*
* Obsidian Stairs*
* Obsidian Slab*
* Obsidian Pressure Plate*

> _*_ Note: can be crafted at a stonecutter.

Also note that the door is openable by all players, not the owner-only like a metal door.

While you can enable this mod for [Minetest Game](https://content.luanti.org/packages/Minetest/minetest_game/), it does not enable any new items because they all depend on Mineclonia APIs.

## Using
These very-blast-resistant blocks make a dark and fascinating abode!

![](screenshot.png)

## Configuring
N/A

# Credits and license
The code is licensed GPL 3.0.

The few graphics assets included directly in this mod are used under [MIT License](https://spdx.org/licenses/MIT.html) and are derived from [Mineclonia](https://content.luanti.org/packages/ryvnf/mineclonia/).

* doors_item_obsidian.png
* obsidian_extra_door_obsidian_lower.png
* obsidian_extra_door_obsidian_upper.png
* obsidian_extra_trapdoor_obsidian.png
